verbs.description: [ARG0: John McCain] [V: rebukes] [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in a new memoir] , [ARGM-ADV: accusing the president of failing to uphold U.S. values , speaking in ' appalling ' terms of refugees and inspiring autocrats] .
